Title: Relates to the submission of a twenty-year capital needs assessment to the metropolitan transportation authority capital program review board
Summary: Relates to the submission of a twenty-year capital needs assessment to the metropolitan transportation authority capital program review board; provides that such assessment shall be adopted by not less than a majority of members of the authority in the office, except in the event of a tie.
LawCode: Amd ยง1269-c, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the submission of a twenty-year capital needs assessment to the metropolitan transportation authority capital program review board
